scripts.postinstall: npx lerna link --force-local && npx lerna run build && npx lerna run copy:package:cjs
scripts.test: echo running all tests is not supported, maybe run: "yarn test:lint"
scripts.clean: yarn clean:dist; yarn clean:modules; yarn clean:packages
scripts.clean:modules: rimraf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json lerna-debug.log yarn-error.log
scripts.clean:packages: lerna exec -- rimraf dist node_modules yarn.lock yarn-error.log package-lock.json
scripts.link:all: npx lerna exec -- yarn unlink; npx lerna exec -- yarn link
scripts.link:all-force: npx lerna exec -- yarn unlink; yarn link:all
